The big story
Three years ago, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told an audience in India, “it’s totally hopeless to compete with us on training foundation models but you should try anyway.” Altman walked back his comments the next day.

title: ‘Smart control’ – and the legal fiction of a voluntary closure
summary:
By the time a chokepoint is tested, the damage is already priced in. The question is whether the market is pricing in enough.

title: Evri and Parcel2Go extend partnership with new drop-off service
summary:
Evri has announced an extension to its partnership with shipping platform Parcel2Go. The renewed agreement aims to build on the strategic relationship between the two companies which has focused on providing affordable delivery services for consumers and businesses.

Parcel2Go is expanding its drop-off offering with a new Shop2Shop and locker service for Evri which, for the first time, will enable consumers and businesses accessing Evri’s services through the platform to have their parcels delivered to their nearest ParcelShop or locker.

title: Gothenburg region named best logistics location in the Nordics
summary:
The Gothenburg region has been ranked the top logistics location in the Nordic region by Swedish trade publication Dagens Logistik.

In its assessment, the magazine highlighted the role of the Port of Gothenburg as a key hub for international imports and exports and a central factor in the region’s position as a logistics center.

Jacob Minnhagen, senior market development manager at the Port of Gothenburg, said the recognition reflects the port’s role in regional freight development.

title: FedEx breaks ground on automated air cargo hub at Navi Mumbai International Airport
summary:
FedEx has broken ground on the construction of a fully automated air cargo hub at Navi Mumbai International Airport, marking a major logistics investment in western India.

The planned 27,870m2 facility represents a long-term investment of more than ₹2,500 crore (US$275m) and is being developed in partnership with Adani Airport Holdings Ltd. Once operational, the hub is expected to create more than 6,000 direct and indirect jobs across logistics, warehousing, transportation and related services.

Continue reading FedEx breaks ground on automated air cargo hub at Navi Mumbai International Airport at Parcel and Postal Technology International.

title: Royal Mail reports improved delivery performance in Q3 2025-26
summary:
Royal Mail has reported improved delivery performance for both First and Second Class mail in the third quarter of the 2025-26 financial year.

The latest independently verified Quality of Service results, published by the company, cover the period from September 29 to November 30, 2025.

During the quarter, 91.6% of Second Class mail was delivered within three working days, while 98.4% arrived within five working days. For First Class mail, 77.5% of items were delivered the next working day and 96.6% were delivered within three working days.

Continue reading Royal Mail reports improved delivery performance in Q3 2025-26 at Parcel and Postal Technology International.
